channel.title: Emergency Alerts - Chesterfield NC
channel.description: Local emergency alert feed for Burke County area

item.title: FLASH FLOOD WARNING - Burke County
item.description: Flash flooding occurring along the Catawba River basin. Multiple roads impassable. Avoid low-lying areas and do not attempt to cross flooded roadways. Turn around, don't drown.

item.title: WINTER STORM WARNING - NC Foothills
item.description: Heavy snow and ice expected. 6-10 inches of snow with up to 0.25 inch ice accumulation. Hazardous travel conditions. Avoid unnecessary travel. Power outages likely.

item.title: LANDSLIDE ADVISORY - Western Burke County
item.description: Saturated soils increasing landslide risk along mountain slopes. Avoid steep terrain and hillside roads. Report any ground movement or new cracks to Burke County Emergency Management at 828-439-4460.

item.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING - Burke County
item.description: Severe thunderstorm capable of producing 60 mph winds and quarter-size hail. Seek shelter in a sturdy building immediately. Stay away from windows.

item.title: WILDFIRE SMOKE ADVISORY - NC Foothills
item.description: Wildfire smoke reducing air quality to unhealthy levels. Limit outdoor activity. Keep windows and doors closed. Those with asthma or respiratory conditions should remain indoors.
